thread.title: Join The Coven and Live An Unforgettable Night at Catalonia Resorts
thread.title_full: Join The Coven and Live An Unforgettable Night at Catalonia Resorts - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Join The Coven and Live An Unforgettable Night at Catalonia Resorts
text:
Exclusive Traveler Club invites you to enjoy a Halloween night on Saturday, October 31st, 2015 at their luxurious hotel located in the Riviera Maya.
 RIVIERA MAYA, MEXICO, October 23, "Everything's ready at Catalonia Riviera Maya ; there are bats, zombies and pumpkins everywhere, and we've prepared a full-day activities program for all ages...", said Ramon Martin, CEO for Exclusive Traveler Club .
The executive of this world renowned vacation club -which provides its VIP clients with an assortment of rewards through its members-only discounts platform- stated that guests of all ages will be able to enjoy a horrifying day and night of fun in every corner of their facilities.
"Our animation staff have prepared a wide array of fun activities to enjoy during the whole day and night," said the Exclusive Traveler Club executive.
The Halloween activities will include Beach Volley matches between Zombies and Monsters, Aqua Zombies in the Pool, a Horror Masks contest with great prices for the winners, and pumpkin shaping lessons for kids, just to mention a few of them.
At night, the party will continue with Banda Kalua's live music at El Abuelo Bar; the Theater will present the "Nightmare" horror show, and for the most daring guests, the Passage of Terror will test their nerve.
To close with a flourish the hotel's Discotheque will be waiting for each frightening creature to dance the night away.
This is part of the benefits that Exclusive Traveler Club offers its guests, in addition to discount rates for hotel stays, car, yacht, and helicopter rental all over the world.
Exclusive Traveler Club is a traveler club that offers VIP members preferred rates and discounts in the Catalonia hotels in Spain, the Canary Islands, Belgium, Mexico, Dominican Republic... With Exclusive Traveler Club, you can get exclusive discounts when booking your travel at these luxury resorts.
Highly committed to elegance, exclusivity and service, Exclusive Traveler Club bets on top-shelf attention to its guests, taking care of every single detail of their membership, in order to achieve its main objective: To create unforgettable memories.
